short_summary: The request is made by CFB Comox, at Lazo BC, to acquire the services of a contractor to perform inspections and maintenance of lifting devices.
description: Here is the detailed description of the contract request
full_summary:
================!=

### Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title (English)**: W6862-230137 CFB Comox Lifting Device Maintenance

**Tender Title (French)**: Maintenance des dispositifs de levage de la BFC Comox

### Solicitation Information

* **Ref # (English)**: WS3755181200-Doc3906642294
* **Amendment # (English)**: 1
* **Tender # (English)**: WS3755181200
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-18
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-18T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-08-11

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
* **Tender Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other bilateral trade agreements with Canada

### Service Location

* **Regional Location**: British Columbia (Colombie-Britannique)
* **Delivery Location**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Comox at Lazo, BC

### End User Information

* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND) (Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN))

### Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-05-15
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) (Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC))

### Contact Information

* **Name and Title**: Nakade, Angela (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la / she-her)
* **Email**: angela.nakade@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Instructions for Tender Submission

The interested contractors should submit their tenders electronically through the designated portal. Any questions or concerns should be addressed to the contracting entity.
